rooms.description: Open concept living area with integrated kitchen and dining space, designed in Chettinad style featuring traditional motifs and intricate carvings.
Fully equipped modern kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring traditional Chettinad accents.
Dedicated dining area within the living zone with traditional decor and ample seating.
Dedicated home office space with minimalistic design and soundproofing, located near the living area for easy access.
Guest room designed with a bed, wardrobe and traditional decorative elements.
Guest en-suite bathroom with modern fixtures and traditional tilework.

openings.description: Large entrance door with traditional wooden carvings leading directly into the living area.
Secondary entrance to connect with the garden and outdoor space.
Large window in living area offering view of the garden.

external_spaces.description: Expansive garden with traditional landscaping elements, water features and seating areas.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Chettinad style decor, featuring a balcony overlooking the garden.
Modern ensuite bathroom for master bedroom with traditional touches.
Dedicated home theater room with soundproofing and ambient lighting.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase connecting ground and upper floors with traditional design.
Window offering a scenic view of the surrounding landscape.

vastu.room_orientation: optimized for natural light and ventilation

building_norms: provision of emergency exits in each floor
